testcase.name: App > should create the app
App > should render form steps container
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Component Creation > should create
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Component Creation > should initialize with default steps
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Component Creation > should initialize activeKey with first step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Input Properties > should accept custom steps input
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Input Properties > should set activeKey when activeKeyInput is provided
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Input Properties > should not change activeKey when activeKeyInput is undefined
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Input Properties > should not change activeKey when activeKeyInput is empty string
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Input Properties > should not change activeKey when activeKeyInput is null
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Output Events > should emit stepChange when onSelect is called
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Output Events > should emit back event when onBack is called
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Output Events > should emit next event when onNext is called
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > activeStep Method > should return the current active step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > activeStep Method > should return undefined when no step matches activeKey
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > activeStep Method > should return first matching step when multiple steps have same key
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onSelect Method > should change activeKey when selecting valid step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onSelect Method > should not change activeKey when selecting disabled step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onSelect Method > should not change activeKey when selecting nonexistent step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onSelect Method > should not emit stepChange when selecting disabled step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onSelect Method > should not emit stepChange when selecting nonexistent step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onSelect Method > should handle undefined step key
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onSelect Method > should handle null step key
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onSelect Method > should handle empty string step key
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onSelect Method > should emit stepChange for valid enabled step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onBack Method > should navigate to previous step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onBack Method > should skip disabled steps when going back
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onBack Method > should not change activeKey when already at first step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onBack Method > should not emit back event when no previous step available
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onBack Method > should handle empty steps array
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onBack Method > should handle all previous steps disabled
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onNext Method > should navigate to next step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onNext Method > should skip disabled steps when going forward
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onNext Method > should not change activeKey when already at last step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onNext Method > should not emit next event when no next step available
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onNext Method > should handle empty steps array
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > onNext Method > should handle all next steps disabled
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Edge Cases > should handle empty steps array
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Edge Cases > should handle all steps disabled
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Edge Cases > should handle single step
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Edge Cases > should handle steps with same key
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Edge Cases > should handle steps with undefined properties
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Signal Behavior > should update activeKey signal correctly
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Signal Behavior > should maintain signal reactivity
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Signal Behavior > should handle multiple signal updates
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Default Steps Configuration > should have correct default step keys
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Default Steps Configuration > should have all default steps enabled
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Default Steps Configuration > should have titles and descriptions for all default steps
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Default Steps Configuration > should have unique keys for default steps
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Method Coverage > should cover activeStep method with various scenarios
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Method Coverage > should cover all branches in onSelect
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Method Coverage > should cover all branches in onBack
FormStepsComponent (Truly Isolated) > Method Coverage > should cover all branches in onNext
StepComponent > should create
StepComponent > should return false for isActive when index differs from currentIndex
StepComponent > should register step without alias using index as fallback
StepComponent > should register step with alias and all properties
StepComponent > should return early from renderContent when host does not exist
StepComponent > should handle contentHtml rendering and re-rendering
StepComponent > should handle componentType rendering with inputs and outputs
StepComponent > should handle lazyLoader rendering with inputs and outputs
StepComponent > should handle invalid componentOutputs gracefully
StepComponent > should handle componentInputs errors gracefully
StepComponent > should handle onSave and unregister on ngOnDestroy
StepComponent > should use index as key on ngOnDestroy without alias
StepComponent > should handle HTML element cleanup and errors on ngOnDestroy
StepComponent > should call renderContent on ngAfterViewInit when active and has host
StepComponent > should handle contentTemplate rendering
StepComponent > should clear host on hostRef setter
StepperComponent (isolated) > should create
StepperComponent (isolated) > should calculate progress percent correctly
StepperComponent (isolated) > should calculate progress percent with custom segments
StepperComponent (isolated) > should return 0 progress when no steps
StepperComponent (isolated) > should get steps from service
StepperComponent (isolated) > should sync linear flag to service in ngAfterContentInit
StepperComponent (isolated) > should update grid columns in ngAfterViewInit
StepperComponent (isolated) > should update grid columns with correct calculations
StepperComponent (isolated) > should handle updateGridColumns with segments <= 0
StepperComponent (isolated) > should sync linear flag in ngOnChanges
StepperComponent (isolated) > should cleanup resize listener in ngOnDestroy
StepperComponent (isolated) > should handle step click when navigable
StepperComponent (isolated) > should not handle step click when not navigable
StepperComponent (isolated) > should get step classes correctly
StepperComponent (isolated) > should get title classes with status overrides
StepperComponent (isolated) > should get title colors by status
StepperComponent (isolated) > should get icon class with custom icons and classes
StepperComponent (isolated) > should handle shouldShowIcon flags
StepperComponent (isolated) > should return true in shouldShowIcon for finished step with showIconOnFinished undefined
StepperComponent (isolated) > should return true in shouldShowIcon for error step with showIconOnError undefined
StepperComponent (isolated) > should get icon colors by status
StepperComponent (isolated) > should get tooltips with status overrides
StepperComponent (isolated) > should return correct progress aria label
StepperComponent (isolated) > should check isFirst and isLast correctly
StepperComponent (isolated) > should handle fallback for getTitleColor, getIconClass, getIconColor, getTooltip
StepperComponent (isolated) > should handle getStepClasses and getTitleClasses for pending/undefined status
StepperComponent (isolated) > should handle getTooltip with only base tooltip
StepperComponent (isolated) > should early return in updateGridColumns when width is 0
StepperComponent (isolated) > should handle keyboard navigation (ArrowRight, ArrowLeft, Home, End) and not handle if not navigable
StepperService > registers steps and maps aliases correctly
StepperService > throws error when registering duplicate alias
StepperService > navigates with goTo and updates statuses (jump applies synthetic error)
StepperService > prev/next respect boundaries and return boolean
StepperService > setStatus by index and alias
StepperService > reset controls visited, statuses and data
StepperService > linear and debug signals can be configured
StepperService > setLinear and setDebug update signals
StepperService > blocks navigation when canExit returns false
StepperService > proceeds navigation when canExit throws error
StepperService > updates existing record with registerStep again
StepperService > registerStep update covers overrides for icons, titles and tooltips
StepperService > unregisterStep removes step and adjusts currentIndex
StepperService > jumping marks visited step as finished (even with canExit)
StepperService > reset with keepData=true preserves data
StepperService > reset with keepData=false clears data and visits only initial index
StepperService > visiting synthetic error with canExit keeps error and traverses branch
StepperService > synthetic error is removed after visiting and does not block again
StepperService > debug logging covers canExit returning false and thrown error
StepperService > logData prints saved payload without throwing
StepperService > navigating back finishes current step
StepperService > invalid goTo returns false and does not change index
StepperService > setStatus by alias updates status correctly
StepperService > effect in constructor runs when currentIndex or stepCount changes
StepperService > covers remaining lines of logData
CollateralComponent > should create component
CollateralComponent > should open and close add modal
CollateralComponent > should call addCollateral on onModalSave and close modal
CollateralComponent > should call removeCollateral on onDelete
CollateralComponent > should call changePage and changePageSize converting values
CollateralComponent > should trigger fileInput click on onImport
CollateralComponent > should import file on onFileSelected when file exists
CollateralComponent > should toggle menu with toggleMenu
CollateralComponent > should close menu on onDocClick when clicking outside
CollateralComponent > should not close menu on onDocClick when clicking inside
CollateralService > should be created
CollateralService > should have initial collaterals as empty array
CollateralService > should have initial page as 1 and pageSize as 12
CollateralService > should have initial loading as false
CollateralService > should have initial total as 0
CollateralService > addCollateral > should add collateral with generated id and default status
CollateralService > addCollateral > should add collateral with custom status when provided
CollateralService > addCollateral > should calculate total correctly after adding collaterals
CollateralService > removeCollateral > should remove collateral by id
CollateralService > removeCollateral > should not affect other collaterals when removing specific id
CollateralService > pagination > should change page
CollateralService > pagination > should change page size and reset page to 1
CollateralService > pagination > should return correct paged collaterals
CollateralService > loading state > should start loading
CollateralService > loading state > should stop loading
CollateralService > importFile > should start loading when importing file
CollateralService > importFile > should stop loading after timeout
CollateralService > edge cases > should handle collaterals with zero or undefined values in total calculation
CollateralService > edge cases > should handle removing non-existent id gracefully
BasicInfoComponent > should create
BasicInfoComponent > should initialize form
BasicInfoComponent > should have form controls
BasicInfoComponent > should have tiposBaixa array
BasicInfoComponent > should have observables defined
BasicInfoComponent > should have observables from service
BasicInfoComponent > formatIsoToInput should format valid ISO to yyyy-MM-dd
BasicInfoComponent > formatIsoToInput should return empty for invalid and sentinel date
BasicInfoComponent > formatIsoToInput should catch exception and return empty
BasicInfoComponent > mapDealRasToContrato should build Contrato correctly
BasicInfoComponent > applyRasToForm should fill form with formatted dates
BasicInfoComponent > performApplyRAS should fetch, apply and lock states correctly
BasicInfoComponent > resetRASLock should clear flags and status
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > ngAfterViewInit: dispara loadNextPage no scroll ao fundo
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > IntersectionObserver: chama onLoadMore quando sentinel intersecta
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > loading$: mantém posição ao recarregar perto do fim

testcase.name: BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > applyRAS: id vazio informa mensagem
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > applyRAS: bloqueio manual abre confirmação
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > confirmApplyRAS: id vazio cancela e informa
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > cancelApplyRAS: esconde confirmação
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > performApplyRAS: lida com erro e não aplica
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onChangePage: deduplica e navega
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onChangePageSize: respeita bloqueio e altera tamanho
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onLoadMore: respeita bloqueio e carrega próxima página
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onSelect: bloqueio manual e contrato selecionado
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onPrevPage: respeita bloqueio e navega quando possível
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onNextPage: respeita bloqueio e limita ao total
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onExcluirRAS: reseta estado de RAS mantendo seleção manual
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onExcluirSelecionado: limpa seleção e bloqueio manual
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > toggleShowRAS: alterna e reseta quando desligado
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > ngOnDestroy: desconecta IntersectionObserver
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onBuscar: respeita bloqueio e chama serviço com parâmetros
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > clearSearch: respeita bloqueio, zera filtros e reconsulta
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > mapDealRasToContrato: usa BaseContract e UseOfProceeds
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > mapDealRasToContrato: fallback para Account e "-" quando operação ausente
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > mapDealRasToContrato: sem chave usa "-" quando dealRAS vazio
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > toggleShowRAS: desliga e força rasLoading false
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > applyRAS: com id e sem bloqueio chama performApplyRAS
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > confirmApplyRAS: com id válido exclui seleção, oculta e chama perform
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onChangePage: quando igual ao atual apenas atualiza lastProcessedPage
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > mapDealRasToContrato: usa dealRAS como chave quando campos vazios
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > mapDealRasToContrato: usa Book quando Product e UseOfProceeds vazios
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > applyRAS: sem id define status e não chama performApplyRAS
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > confirmApplyRAS: sem id define status, oculta modal e não executa
BasicInfoComponent (coverage extras) > onSelect: quando rasLocked verdadeiro não seleciona nem bloqueia manual
BasicInfoService > should be created
BasicInfoService > should initialize with default values
BasicInfoService > should have correct tiposBaixa array
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should search contratos with correct parameters and update observables
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should handle loading more data (page > 1) with same filters
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should reset data when filters change
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should handle HTTP error and reset data
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should set loading to true during request
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should call searchContratos with current filters and new page
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should call searchContratos with current filters, page 1, and new pageSize
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should increment current page and call changePage
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should return current page value
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should return default page value when no search has been performed
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should update filtro signal
BasicInfoService > searchContratos > should update apenasNaoVinculados signal
BasicInfoService > selectContrato > should update selectedContrato observable
BasicInfoService > clearSelection > should clear selectedContrato observable
GetDealRasService > should be created
GetDealRasService > getDealRas > should make GET request with correct URL for string dealRAS
GetDealRasService > getDealRas > should make GET request with correct URL for number dealRAS
